thread.title: Vineeth Sreenivasan's Aby: 5 Reasons To Watch The Movie!
thread.title_full: Vineeth Sreenivasan's Aby: 5 Reasons To Watch The Movie!

title: Vineeth Sreenivasan's Aby: 5 Reasons To Watch The Movie!
text:
Â» Vineeth Sreenivasan's Aby: 5 Reasons To Watch The Movie! Vineeth Sreenivasan's Aby: 5 Reasons To Watch The Movie! Vineeth Sreenivasan starrer Aby is all set to hit the theatres tomorrow (February 23, 2017). Here, we list the 5 reasons to watch the movie. Published:   19:11   
Aby , featuring Vineeth Sreenivasan in the lead role, is all set to hit the theatres tomorrow (February 23, 2017). The film, directed by Srikanth Murali narrates the journey of a guy who follows his dreams. 
The trailer and teasers of the film released by the makers, did hit the right chords with the audiences. Aby , has been produced by Suvin K Varkey under the banner Littlebig Films. 
Here, we list the 5 reasons to watch Aby FDFS.. 
Vineeth Sreenivasan Factor 
Vineeth Sreenivasan plays the title character of Aby in this movie. The actor, is quite choosy about the acting projects that he commits and hence, we definitely feel that there is something special in Aby , that really attracted the actor in him.. 
A Motivational Tale 
Reportedly, Aby has a motivating tale to narrate. The film revolves around a guy who dreams to make an aeroplane, one day. The film is expected to narrate an inspiring story that would give one the confidence to follow your dreams. 
Srikanth Murali - A Debut Film-maker 
The film marks the debut of Srikanth Marali as a film-maker. He was previously seen as an actor in 2016 movie Action Hero Biju . Srikanth has years of experience as an ad-film maker and we can expect a quality work from this debut film-maker. 
Written By Santhosh Echikkanam 
Santhosh Echikkanam, short story writer turned screen writer has penned the script for the film. He is one such sensible writer of the industry who knows to deliver quality products. Earlier, he penned script for movies like Nidra, Annayum Rasoolum, Chandrettan Evideya etc. Aby is also expected to recreate the same magic. 
Talented Actors In The Supporting Cast List 
Apart from Vineeth Sreenivasan, Aby also has an array of strong supporting actors in the cast list. Aju Varghese, Suraj Venjaramoodu, Mareena Michael, Sudheer Karamana, Dileesjh Pothen etc., portray important roles in the movie.
